title: This Game has infinite banned me
body: Because of riot kicking me from there game i got a 5 game 20 min ban. Cool I'm down to my 5th game and GUESS WHAT! 2hours later still in que :D is riot going to reimburse me or have I just wasted a crap ton of my time. I submitted a ticket and still no response after an hour

replies.body: Weird, it looks like your account played off the last of its LPQ on the 8th. If you ever see that LPQ timer resetting for no reason, be sure to take a screenshot like this and shoot it our way. Once we can see this, we should be able to get it fixed up.
I sent it in and guess what I got NOTHING for wasting my time. It's just sad i wasted hours on waiting for something you guys fucked up on. {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

You need to be patient. Things do not happen in an hour. When you submit a support ticket, it gets placed in a queue along with *all* other support tickets that have been issued. This being a weekend (in the USA) as well as being submitted at a non-business time likely means you will need to wait for tomorrow *at least* for a response. If you continue to submit more tickets or comment on your existing ones to "bump" them they will move back to the end of the queue.
Please upvote this so riot can see because i submitted a ticket and they do not respond! Thank you :)
